body.p:
Louisville July 22d, 1861.
To his Excellency B. Magoffin Govenor, and Commander in Chief &c
Sir
Herewith please accept my resignation as 2nd Lieut Co. K 2d Bat 2d Reg. K. S. G.

R. McKee
Maj. 2 Bat. 2 Reg. Inft.
Louisville, July 22 1861
